ygData.subject: RE: What have people seen change with the patch?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I agree, I read on Stratics that there are some new items being foraged...has anyone foraged any of these new items yet?  I noticed there were a lot of
ygData.messageBody:
> Just
> wondering what funky new stuff people have seen like Shadow
> Men, mushrooms
> and cabbages. Also any changes that we, as bards should
> watch out for.

I agree, I read on Stratics that there are some new items being
foraged...has anyone foraged any of these new items yet? I noticed there
were a lot of changes to graphics on items as well, for example, I had a
flowing black robe in the bank and when I went to get it yesterday night it
looked like a flowing black robe instead of that light blue bathrobe graphic
it used to have. Lets be bardic and share some of our new discoveries.

- Faras Tar'Linedhel
E'ci
